channel.title: Combat-X Eco/Pvp
channel.description:
[center][URL=http://nimga.com/v/AjBYS][IMG]http://nimga.com/m/AjBYS.gif[/img][/URL] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/300yyds.jpg[/img]
[url=http://combatx.stigsbo.com/][img]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/icon_homepage.png[/img]Website[img]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/icon_homepage.png[/img][/url] [url=http://combatx.stigsbo.com/webclient.html][img]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/play.gif[/img]Webclient[img]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/play.gif[/img][/url][/center]
[center][b]Features[/b]
- 317 Loading 602 with lots of new items - All special attacks works perfectly - Active PvP - Active Players - Flawless switching - A few spawnable sets - Unique dungeoneering - Great Donator features - 21 of 24 Skills works, still working on the last 3 - Great new items - Tokhaar-Kal, Zaryte bow, Armadyl Battlestaff, etc. - Dicing and Dicing zone - Bosses like: Nex, Corp, Tormented demons, Bork, etc. - PK Locations like: Wests, Dragons, Mage bank and much more [b]- Vps hosted for the coming 6 months[/b] [/center] Shops + Titles [center][img]http://nimga.com/m/HyHpp.gif[/img][/center]
Bosses [center][img]http://nimga.com/m/33VOL.gif[/img]
Recently added:
[center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/a5gwwn.png[/img]
[center][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2r6obrq.png[/img]
[b]Regards Andrezz & Brandon[/b][/center]
